articles.title: Apple and Amazon Have Fallen for 6 Straight Weeks. There Could Be More Pain Ahead. - Barron's
articles.description: While Apple and Amazon have fallen sharply over the past six weeks, so has the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite, which has put in its worst six-week performance since April 2020.
articles.content:
Apple and Amazon.com kicked off the second week of May looking as if the stocks would extend their six-week losing streaks, the longest since before the pandemic.
